metadata.title: RAMANA S.A. - Official CANAL+ Partner Cameroon & CAR | Since 1995
metadata.description: Leading CANAL+ wholesale partner in Cameroon and CAR. 100+ sales points. Professional installation, premium packages. Authorized since 1995.

hero.headline: Your TV Has No Limits
hero.subheadline: RAMANA S.A., CANAL+ wholesale partner since 1995. Expert in CANAL+ package distribution in Cameroon and Central African Republic. Availability and promptness are our strengths.

about.title: Who We Are
about.content: RAMANA S.A. is one of 7 authorized CANAL+ wholesalers in Cameroon, with over 28 years of experience. As a wholesale partner since 1995, we have established ourselves as a reliable reference in providing and installing satellite TV systems.
about.content2: With a distribution network comprising over 100 sales points across Cameroon and Central African Republic, including ten company-owned outlets, we bring the best CANAL+ packages to urban households and the most remote areas.
about.content3: Our expertise extends beyond simple distribution. We offer comprehensive services including supply and installation of professional audiovisual equipment, as well as training technicians in electronic and audiovisual maintenance.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.missionContent: To offer CANAL+ packages to households in urban centers and remote areas across Cameroon and Central African Republic. We are committed to providing superior quality service, professional installation, and reliable technical support to guarantee an exceptional television experience for all our customers.
mission.visionContent: To be the leading CANAL+ wholesale partner in Central Africa, recognized for our operational excellence, exceptional territorial coverage, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. We aspire to connect every household to the best in premium television entertainment.

teamGallery.title: The RAMANA Family
teamGallery.subtitle: OUR TEAMS
teamGallery.description: More than a company, a passionate community. From international conventions to field operations, meet the people who make the difference.
teamGallery.img1Caption: Distributor Convention in Valmorel (2015) - A History of Excellence
teamGallery.img2Caption: Our Field Teams in Action - Proximity and Service

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your television entertainment
services.service1Desc: As one of 7 official CANAL+ wholesalers in Cameroon, we distribute all CANAL+ packages via Direct Satellite Reception (DSR) and other platforms. Our offerings include all CANAL+ packages, from entry-level to premium bouquets.
services.service2Desc: Professional supply and installation of individual and collective TV systems. Our qualified technicians ensure standard-compliant installation, whether for a private residence, apartment building, hotel, or business.
services.service3Desc: Complete supply and installation of professional electronic and audiovisual equipment. From home cinema to complex commercial installations, we offer solutions tailored to your specific needs.
services.service4Desc: Specialized training for technicians in electronic and audiovisual maintenance. Our training programs cover installation, repair, and maintenance of CANAL+ and audiovisual equipment.

whyUs.title: Why Choose RAMANA S.A.?
whyUs.subtitle: The advantages that make our difference since 1995
whyUs.advantage1Desc: One of 7 authorized CANAL+ wholesale distributors in Cameroon, guaranteeing authenticity and quality of all our products and services.
whyUs.advantage2Desc: Responsive and available customer service. Our teams respond quickly to your requests and ensure installations in the shortest time.
whyUs.advantage3Desc: Over 100 sales points across Cameroon and Central African Republic. We reach urban areas and the most remote regions.
whyUs.advantage4Desc: Over 28 years of experience in CANAL+ distribution. Thousands of satisfied customers testify to the reliability of our services.
whyUs.advantage5Desc: Team of certified and experienced technicians for professional installation and maintenance of all your equipment.
whyUs.advantage6Desc: After-sales service and technical support available to resolve any issue quickly and efficiently.
whyUs.advantage7Desc: Wide range of CANAL+ packages for all budgets. Regular promotional offers for our loyal customers.
whyUs.advantage8Desc: 10+ company-owned outlets and 90+ distributor partners to serve you wherever you are.
whyUs.advantage9Desc: Regional partner recognized for our professionalism, integrity, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

coverage.title: Our Coverage
coverage.subtitle: Present wherever you are
coverage.content: With over 100 sales points distributed across Cameroon and Central African Republic, RAMANA S.A. guarantees easy access to our services, whether you are in urban or rural areas.
coverage.cities: Yaoundé | Douala | Bafoussam | Garoua | Maroua | Bamenda | Ngaoundéré | Bangui (CAR)

distributor.title: Become a CANAL+ Distributor
distributor.subtitle: Join our partner network
distributor.content: Would you like to become an authorized CANAL+ distributor and join the RAMANA S.A. network? We are looking for motivated partners in all regions of Cameroon and Central African Republic.
distributor.benefit1Desc: Attractive margins and high growth potential
distributor.benefit3Desc: Access to the best CANAL+ packages

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.q1: I have no images on my screen, what should I do?
faq.a1: First check that your decoder is turned on and all cables are properly connected. Make sure your satellite dish is properly oriented. If the problem persists, contact our technical service at 699759900 for quick assistance.
faq.q2: My screen displays an error message, how to resolve?
faq.a2: Error messages can have several causes: expired subscription, signal problem, defective card. Note the error code displayed and contact us via WhatsApp at 699759900. Our technicians will guide you to resolve the problem quickly.
faq.q3: How can I renew my CANAL+ subscription?
faq.a3: Several options are available: visit one of our 100+ sales points, call our customer service at 699759900, or contact us via WhatsApp. We accept Mobile Money, credit card, and cash payments. Renewal is instant.
faq.q4: Can I install CANAL+ in my village/rural area?
faq.a4: Absolutely! C'est precisely our mission to bring CANAL+ everywhere in Cameroon and CAR, including the most remote areas. Contact us to check satellite coverage in your area and we'll arrange installation with our qualified technicians.
faq.q5: How to become an authorized CANAL+ distributor?
faq.a5: To become a RAMANA S.A. partner distributor, you must have suitable commercial space, investment capacity, and commitment to service quality. Contact us at 677781015 or by email at info@ramanasa.com to receive the complete application file.
faq.a6: We distribute all official packages: ACCESS (5000F), EVASION (10000F), ACCESS+ (15000F), and TOUT CANAL+ (28000F). Our advisors can help you choose the right formula.
faq.a7: Yes, we offer complete installation services by our certified technicians. Installation includes dish mounting, decoder connection, signal adjustment, and initial configuration.
faq.q8: What is the warranty period on equipment?
faq.a8: All equipment we provide (decoders, dishes, cables) benefits from CANAL+ manufacturer warranty. In case of defect, we ensure replacement or repair according to warranty terms.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Satisfaction testimonials
testimonials.t1Quote: Now in my 10th year with Ramana, my satisfaction is complete. Impeccable service, professional installation, and technical support always available. I highly recommend!
testimonials.t2Quote: I opened my CANAL+ distribution outlet with RAMANA in 2018. Their support and professionalism enabled me to develop a prosperous business.
testimonials.t3Quote: Quick installation even in my rural area. Technicians are competent and signal is excellent. RAMANA kept all its promises.
testimonials.t4Quote: For our hotel's audiovisual equipment, RAMANA provided us with a complete and professional solution. Excellent value for money.
